DOC.brief_title: Radiotherapy With Humidification Head And Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This phase III trial address four hypothesis . The primary hypothesis : Humidification modulate natural history mucositis result clinically significant reduction intensity severe acute mucositis function time CTCAE grade > 1 mucositis ( e.g . grade 2 high ) , measure area time curve ( AUC ) plot express grade acute reaction vs week observe CTCAE mucosal reaction > 1 The additional hypothesis : - Humidification palliate acute symptom mucositis xerostomia - Humidification cost effective reduction hospital bed occupancy - Humidification improve functional outcome , particularly swallow function , patient head neck cancer treat radiotherapy
